description: Produces an assessment report that includes detailed and comprehensive results of a specified assessment run.

parameters.name: assessmentRunArn
parameters.description: The ARN that specifies the assessment run for which you want to generate a report.

parameters.name: reportFileFormat
parameters.description: Specifies the file format (html or pdf) of the assessment report that you want to generate.

parameters.name: reportType
parameters.description: Specifies the type of the assessment report that you want to generate. There are two types of assessment reports: a finding report and a full report. For more information, see Assessment Reports.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: Specifies the status of the request to generate an assessment report.

nested_items.name: url
nested_items.description: Specifies the URL where you can find the generated assessment report. This parameter is only returned if the report is successfully generated.
